alert.note: Alert for Chesapeake; Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; James City; Newport News; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Southampton; Suffolk; Surry; Sussex; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 12:58AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Isle of Wight, northeastern Southampton, southeastern York, eastern Sussex, southeastern James City and Surry Counties, the City of Poquoson, the western City of Norfolk, the northwestern City of Chesapeake, the City of Hampton, the City of Newport News, the City of Portsmouth and the northeastern City of Suffolk through 145 AM EDT... At 1258 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Scotland to near Ivor to near Courtland. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small trees and blow around unsecured objects. Wind impacting handling of high profile vehicles. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Surry and Scotland around 105 AM EDT. Isle Of Wight around 110 AM EDT. Smithfield, Carrsville and Fort Eustis around 115 AM EDT. Newport News, Lee Hall, Denbigh and Zuni around 120 AM EDT. Windsor, Patrick Henry Field, Rescue and Tabb around 125 AM EDT. Hampton, Seaford, Christopher Newport University, Suffolk, Kings Fork, Crittenden and Beaconsdale around 130 AM EDT. Downtown Suffolk and Northampton around 135 AM EDT. Hampton University, Old Dominion University, Langley AFB, Portsmouth, Fort Monroe, Driver and Norfolk NAS around 140 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Vicksville, Pons, Carrollton, Chippokes State Park, Longview, Oriana, Huntersville, Yale, Lumberton and Chuckatuck. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for south central and southeastern Virginia.

area.areaDesc: Chesapeake; Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; James City; Newport News; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Southampton; Suffolk; Surry; Sussex; York
